column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Think Independently
#Text=The burden of history , society , family , friends etc. keep many people captives .
#Text=In fact , unbelievable as it may sound , no human being can claim to be totally Independent nor act and speak independently .
#Text=We are always in one way or the other influenced by others -people , facts , events , dogmas , religion ... -
#Text=However , in order to be the master of his own , ones need to Think Independently .
#Text=How ?
#Text=Steps
#Text=Be confident and trust yourself .
#Text=If you want to choose things for yourself , decide on your own , try to be confident and trust yourself .
#Text=Ex : you should learn to like your choices , accept that you are a human being like the President , the Queen , the top 500 ...
#Text=You must learn to say " no " and " yes " , even if the whole world in unison says the contrary .
#Text=But be sure that what you think is what you feel and is the Right thing !
#Text=Claim independence from people , beliefs , dogmas , prejudices that keep you captive .
#Text=Do n't let yourself be influenced negatively .
#Text=Take a stand even if it is against the will and the point of view of your most loved or trusted ones .
#Text=Do n't let anybody decide for you unless you think it Right .
#Text=Do things that make you feel confident and happy .
#Text=But if you do any harm to anybody , refrain ...
#Text=Tips
#Text=Try to be responsible and do n't fear to tell the truth .
#Text=Ex : Inadvertently you broke the glass of your neighbor or you throw a stone on the roof of somebody .
#Text=Be courageous enough to say I did it .
#Text=I do apologize ...
#Text=Read books , magazines , articles that build on your self-confidence .
#Text=During debates , at school or even in daily conversation , do n't be afraid to give your point of view and say what you think or feel even if it seems silly .

#Text=If you do n't feel like your opinion is well formed , or maybe you 're not as well educated in a subject as you 'd like to be , it never hurts to take a step back from the debate and admit that you need time to think .
#Text=Talk to people who take you as their equal as individual but not those who see you as immature , castaway or else .
#Text=Once you 've learnt to be confident about yourself , you 'll be able to accept what you think .
#Text=Are you a believer ?

#Text=Ex : if you are a christian , you may have a leader -priest , pastor , prophet ... - If you do not agree or you do not trust what he says , do n't just say yes because he is the servant of God .
#Text=Go and read the bible yourself and ask God to help you understand .
#Text=But you can rebel to the teachings of your community , church , group if you feel that it is contrary to the divine prescriptions .
#Text=Warnings
#Text=Thinking independently is good .
#Text=But accept the point of view of other people about your decisions and your stands .

#Text=What you think could have negative impact on others -in your neighborhood , community , city country or on the whole world- So be moderate and accept sometimes the point of view of others if your decision is Hazardous
